<seg xml:id="C31_app40-fMS_start"/> money <seg xml:id="C31_app40-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c57-0157__main__11"/><anchor xml:id="c57-0157.02"/><lb n="c57-0157__left_margin__1"/>together <lb n="c57-0157__left_margin__2"/>with <anchor xml:id="c57-0157.05"/>a few jewels <seg xml:id="C31_app42-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0157__main__d4e29758"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0157__main__d4e29760">that</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0157__main__d4e29763"/>which <seg xml:id="C31_app42-fMS_end"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0157__main__d4e29763"/><mod eID="c57-0157__main__d4e29758"/>had belonged to my <seg xml:id="C31_app44-fMS_start"/> mother <seg xml:id="C31_app44-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c57-0157__main__12"/>& <seg xml:id="C31_app46-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0157__main__d4e29769">left it.</del> departed <seg xml:id="C31_app46-fMS_end"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c57-0157__main__13"/>And now my wanderings <seg xml:id="C31_app48-fMS_start"/> began <seg xml:id="C31_app48-fMS_end"/> which are to <lb n="c57-0157__main__14"/>cease but with <seg xml:id="C31_app50-fMS_start"/> life – <seg xml:id="C31_app50-fMS_end"/> I have traversed a vast <seg xml:id="C31_app52-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0157__main__15"/><mod sID="c57-0157__main__d4e29781"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0157__main__d4e29783">extent</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0157__main__d4e29786"/>portion <seg xml:id="C31_app52-fMS_end"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0157__main__d4e29786"/><mod eID="c57-0157__main__d4e29781"/>of <seg xml:id="C31_app54-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0157__main__d4e29790"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0157__main__d4e29792">country</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0157__main__d4e29795"/>the <seg xml:id="C31_app54-fMS_end"/>

<seg xml:id="C31_app59-fMS_start"/> travellers <seg xml:id="C31_app59-fMS_end"/> in <seg xml:id="C31_app61-fMS_start"/> desarts <seg xml:id="C31_app61-fMS_end"/> & barbarous <seg xml:id="C31_app63-fMS_start"/> countries <seg xml:id="C31_app63-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c57-0157__main__17"/>are wont to <seg xml:id="C31_app65-fMS_start"/> meet – <seg xml:id="C31_app65-fMS_end"/> How I <seg xml:id="C31_app67-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0157__main__d4e29816"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0157__main__d4e29818"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0157__main__d4e29818"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0157__main__d4e29824"/>have <seg xml:id="C31_app67-fMS_end"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0157__main__d4e29824"/><mod eID="c57-0157__main__d4e29816"/>lived I hardly <seg xml:id="C31_app69-fMS_start"/> know <lb n="c57-0157__main__18"/> <del rend="smear" xml:id="c57-0157__main__d4e29830">for</del> <seg xml:id="C31_app69-fMS_end"/> many times <seg xml:id="C31_app71-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0157__main__d4e29833"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0157__main__d4e29835">did</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0157__main__d4e29838"/>have <seg xml:id="C31_app71-fMS_end"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0157__main__d4e29838"/><mod eID="c57-0157__main__d4e29833"/>I <seg xml:id="C31_app73-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0157__main__d4e29843"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0157__main__d4e29845">lie</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="sublinear" sID="c57-0157__main__d4e29848"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0157__main__d4e29850"><unclear reason="illegible">stretch</unclear></del> stretched my failing limbs<sga-add eID="c57-0157__main__d4e29848"/><mod eID="c57-0157__main__d4e29843"/> <seg xml:id="C31_app73-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C31_app74-fMS_start"/> on <seg xml:id="C31_app74-fMS_end"/> the sandy <seg xml:id="C31_app76-fMS_start"/> plain <lb n="c57-0157__main__19"/>exhausted & far from succour, <seg xml:id="C31_app76-fMS_end"/> & prayed for <seg xml:id="C31_app78-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0157__main__20"/>death – <seg xml:id="C31_app78-fMS_end"/> But revenge kept me <seg xml:id="C31_app80-fMS_start"/> alive – <seg xml:id="C31_app80-fMS_end"/> I dared <lb n="c57-0157__main__21"/>not <seg xml:id="C31_app82-fMS_start"/> die <seg xml:id="C31_app82-fMS_end"/> & leave my adversary in <seg xml:id="C31_app84-fMS_start"/> being.— <seg xml:id="C31_app84-fMS_end"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c57-0157__main__22"/>When I quitted <seg xml:id="C31_app86-fMS_start"/> Geneva <seg xml:id="C31_app86-fMS_end"/> my first <seg xml:id="C31_app88-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0157__main__d4e29869"> <unclear reason="illegible">a</unclear> </del> labour <lb n="c57-0157__main__23"/>was to gain some <seg xml:id="C31_app88-fMS_end"/>

<seg xml:id="C31_app114-fMS_start"/> silent <seg xml:id="C31_app114-fMS_end"/> except the <lb n="c57-0157__main__32"/>leaves of the <seg xml:id="C31_app116-fMS_start"/> trees <seg xml:id="C31_app116-fMS_end"/> which <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0157__main__d4e29966"/>were <seg xml:id="C31_app118-fMS_start"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0157__main__d4e29966"/> gentl<mod sID="c57-0157__main__d4e29969"/> <mdel>e</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0157__main__d4e29973"/>y<sga-add eID="c57-0157__main__d4e29973"/><mod eID="c57-0157__main__d4e29969"/><mod sID="c57-0157__main__d4e29977"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0157__main__d4e29979">rustled</del> <seg xml:id="C31_app118-fMS_end"/> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0157__main__d4e29982"/>agitated<sga-add eID="c57-0157__main__d4e29982"/><mod eID="c57-0157__main__d4e29977"/> by the <seg xml:id="C31_app120-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0157__main__33"/>breeze — <seg xml:id="C31_app120-fMS_end"/> The night was nearly <seg xml:id="C31_app122-fMS_start"/> dark and the <lb n="c57-0157__main__34"/>scene would have been <milestone spanTo="#c57-0157.09" unit="tei:seg" xml:id="c57-0157.10"/>even to an <w ana="start"/>unin<lb n="c57-0157__main__35"/>terested<w ana="end"/> observer <anchor xml:id="c57-0157.09"/> <milestone spanTo="#c57-0157.07" unit="tei:seg" xml:id="c57-0157.08"/>affecting and solem<mod sID="c57-0157__main__d4e30004"/><mdel>m</mdel><sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0157__main__d4e30008"/>n<sga-add eID="c57-0157__main__d4e30008"/><mod eID="c57-0157__main__d4e30004"/> <anchor xml:id="c57-0157.07"/>–the <seg xml:id="C31_app122-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c57-0157__main__36"/>spirits of the <seg xml:id="C31_app124-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0157__main__d4e30016"/> <mdel>d</mdel> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0157__main__d4e30020"/>departed<sga-add eID="c57-0157__main__d4e30020"/><mod eID="c57-0157__main__d4e30016"/> seemed to flit <seg xml:id="C31_app124-fMS_end"/>
